00030 void run( void ){
00031         GRAPH<int,int> T;
00032         list<segment> S1pointlist;
00033         list<segment> S2pointlist;
00034         point q( 0 , 0 );
00035         point p( 15.0 , 15.0 );
00036         point r( 16.0 , 13.92838828 );
00037         line S1(q,p);
00038         line S2(q,r);
00039         double angle_alpha = S1.angle( S2 );
00040         list<polygon> POLYS;
00041 
00042         random_source X( 0, 15 );
00043         random_source Y( 0, 15 );
00044         double x1,y1,x2,y2;
00045         X >> x1;
00046         Y >> y1;
00047         X >> x2;

00069         
00070         S = S1.seg();
00071         S1pointlist.append( S );
00072         //S1pointlist.print();

00074         S2pointlist.append( S );

00087         int count=0;

00089         edge_array<bool> marked( M, false );
00090         int countTemp = 0;
00091         forall_nodes( n,M ){
00092 
00093                         forall_nodes( m, M ){
00094                                 if( m != n ){
00095                                         forall_nodes( o, M ){
00096                                                 edge e1,e2,e3;
00097                                                 if( m != n && m != o && n != o && ispath( M, m , n, marked, e1 ) && ispath( M, n, o, marked, e2 ) && ispath( M, o, m, marked, e3 ) ){
00098                                                                 if( marked[ e1 ] == false || marked[ e2 ] == false || marked[ e3 ] == false ){
00099                                                                         triangle tri( M[ n ], M[ m ], M[ o ] );         
00100                                                                         marked[ e1 ] = true;
00101                                                                         marked[ e2 ] = true;
00102                                                                         marked[ e3 ] = true;
00103                                                                         Triangles.append( tri );
00104                                                                         count++;
00105                                                                 }       
00106 #ifdef debugTriangle
00107                                                                 countTemp++;
00108 #endif
00109                                                 }
00110                                         }
00111                                 } 
00112                         }
00113         }

00117         //Random number generator between 0 and 100 meters

00122         int x3_3;
00123 
00124         list<d3_plane> Planes;
00125         list<d3_rat_point> D3Points;
00126         forall( tri, Triangles ){
00127                 RANDOM >> x3_1;
00128                 RANDOM >> x3_2;
00129                 RANDOM >> x3_3;
00130                 d3_point a( tri.point1().xcoord()/5, tri.point1().ycoord()/5, x3_1/5 );
00131                 d3_point b( tri.point2().xcoord()/5, tri.point2().ycoord()/5, x3_2/5 );
00132                 d3_point c( tri.point3().xcoord()/5, tri.point3().ycoord()/5, x3_3/5 );
00133 
00134                 if( isExist( D3Points, tri.point1() ) == false )
00135                         D3Points.append( a );
00136                 if( isExist( D3Points, tri.point2() ) == false )
00137                         D3Points.append( b );
00138                 if( isExist( D3Points, tri.point3() ) == false )
00139                         D3Points.append( c );
00140 
00141                 d3_plane p( a, b, c );          
00142 
00143                 //cout << endl << a << "\t" << b << "\t" << c << endl;
00144                 Planes.append( p );
00145         }
